Navigation

Automation Rule

List all automation rules in an account

GET

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

automation\_rules

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/automation_rules \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

403

Copy

```
{
  "payload": [\
    {\
      "id": 123,\
      "account_id": 123,\
      "name": "Add label on message create event",\
      "description": "Add label support and sales on message create event if incoming message content contains text help",\
      "event_name": "message_created",\
      "conditions": [\
        {\
          "attribute_key": "content",\
          "filter_operator": "contains",\
          "values": [\
            "help"\
          ],\
          "query_operator": "and"\
        }\
      ],\
      "actions": [\
        {\
          "action_name": "add_label",\
          "action_params": [\
            "support",\
            "sales"\
          ]\
        }\
      ],\
      "created_on": 123,\
      "active": true\
    }\
  ]
}
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

#### Query Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#parameter-page)

page

integer

default:1

The page parameter

#### Response

200

200403

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-payload)

payload

object\[\]object

Response payload that contains automation rule(s)
Array of automation rules (for listing endpoint)

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-id)

id

integer

The ID of the automation rule

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-account-id)

account\_id

integer

Account Id

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-name)

name

string

The name of the rule

Example:

`"Add label on message create event"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-description)

description

string

Description to give more context about the rule

Example:

`"Add label support and sales on message create event if incoming message content contains text help"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-event-name)

event\_name

enum<string>

Automation Rule event, on which we call the actions(conversation\_created, conversation\_updated, message\_created)

Available options:

`conversation_created`,

`conversation_updated`,

`message_created`

Example:

`"message_created"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-conditions)

conditions

object\[\]

Array of conditions on which conversation/message filter would work

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-values)

values

string\[\]

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-attribute-key)

attribute\_key

string

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-query-operator)

query\_operator

string

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-filter-operator)

filter\_operator

string

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-actions)

actions

object\[\]

Array of actions which we perform when condition matches

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-action-name)

action\_name

string

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-action-params)

action\_params

string\[\]

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-created-on)

created\_on

integer

The timestamp when the rule was created

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/list-all-automation-rules-in-an-account#response-active)

active

boolean

Enable/disable automation rule
